ticket.title: nested :joins scope can't be merged correctly
ticket.original-body:
For example, while Blog has_many :posts and Post has_many :comments, both of the following two Arelish query fails:
@@@ ruby Blog.joins(:posts) & Post.joins(:comments) @@@
@@@ ruby Comment.joins(:post) & Post.joins(:blog) @@@
I really hope this nested :joins to work as expected, since it might be almost equivalent to:
@@@ ruby Comment.first :joins => {:post => :blog} @@@
which has been working since Rails 1.1 or so.
ticket.latest-body:
For example, while Blog has_many :posts and Post has_many :comments, both of the following two Arelish query fails:
@@@ ruby Blog.joins(:posts) & Post.joins(:comments) @@@
@@@ ruby Comment.joins(:post) & Post.joins(:blog) @@@
I really hope this nested :joins to work as expected, since it might be almost equivalent to:
@@@ ruby Comment.first :joins => {:post => :blog} @@@
which has been working since Rails 1.1 or so.
ticket.original-body-html:
For example, while Blog has_many :posts and Post has_many :comments, both of the following two Arelish query fails:

Blog.joins(:posts) & Post.joins(:comments)

Comment.joins(:post) & Post.joins(:blog)

I really hope this nested :joins to work as expected, since it might be almost equivalent to:

Comment.first :joins => {:post => :blog}

which has been working since Rails 1.1 or so.

For example, while Blog has_many :posts and Post has_many :comments, both of the following two Arelish query fails:

Blog.joins(:posts) & Post.joins(:comments)

Comment.joins(:post) & Post.joins(:blog)

I really hope this nested :joins to work as expected, since it might be almost equivalent to:

Comment.first :joins => {:post => :blog}

version.title: nested :joins scope can't be merged correctly

version.body:
Hey Akira! I'm not sure if we support & in relations. Have you tried the following instead?
Comment.joins(:post => :blog)
If not, could you please add a test case to Rails suite showing what do you want to achieve? Thanks a lot!
version.body-html:
Hey Akira! I'm not sure if we support & in relations. Have you tried the following instead?

Comment.joins(:post => :blog)

If not, could you please add a test case to Rails suite showing what do you want to achieve? Thanks a lot!
version.title: nested :joins scope can't be merged correctly
